text: Roddy McKenzie (born 31 July 1945) is a former professional footballer, who played as goalkeeper for Airdrieonians, Hibernian and Clydebank. McKenzie was capped once by Northern Ireland, in a 1966–67 British Home Championship match against Wales. He also played three times for the Northern Ireland under-23 team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Roddy McKenzie (footballer, born 1945)
